long_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece, the sumptuous Patagonia Los Lobos jacket boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so you stay comfortable. Los Lobos jacket features sleek taffeta trim at the front zipper and pockets, and a taffeta lining. Front princess seaming lends a contoured fit. Cozy hand pockets lined with brushed tricot.
short_description: Made from deep-pile polyester fleece, the sumptuous Patagonia Los Lobos jacket boasts sleek styling, a tall collar and handwarmer pockets.
